protocol_name: gDNA Extraction of Eucalypts pauciflora for full genome sequencing
protocol_name_html: gDNA Extraction of Eucalypts pauciflora for full genome sequencing
description: This extraction protocol follows the DArT DNA Extraction protocol but contains modifications (including increasing the concentration of PVP to 4 %
protocol_affiliation: Macquarie University,University of New South Wales, Royal Botanic Garden Sydney

authors_list.name: Susan Rutherford
authors_list.affiliation: University of New South Wales, Royal Botanic Garden Sydney

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
Extraction Buffer

0.35 M sorbitol

0.1 M TrisHCl pH 8

5 mM EDTA pH 8

 

To make 500 mL:

31.9 g sorbitol

50 mL 1 M TrisHCl

5 mL 0.5 M EDTA

Fill up to 500 mL with deionised water

 

Lysis Buffer

0.2 M TrisHCl pH 8

0.05 M EDTA pH 8

2 M NaCl

2 % CTAB

 

To make 500 mL:

100 mL 1 M TrisHCl pH 8

50 mL 0.5 M EDTA pH 8

200 mL NaCl

10 g CTAB

Fill up to 500 mL with deionised water

 

 

Sarcosyl stock (5 %)

 

 

Fresh Working Buffer: Make up fresh working buffer (this lasts 3-4 days). Contains 0.5 % sodiumdisulfite and 4 % PVP-40 (K29-32) Sigma

 

To make 120 mL:

0.6 g sodiumdisulfite

4.8 g PVP-40

50 mL extraction buffer

50 mL lysis buffer

20 mL sarcosyl

 

To make 30 mL:

0.15 g sodiumdisulfite

1.2 g PVP-40

12.5 mL extraction buffer

12.5 mL lysis buffer

5 mL sarcosyl

 

Proteinase K (0.1 mg/mL of fresh working buffer). This is 30 uL of Qiagen proteinase K (20 mg/mL).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Extraction Buffer

0.35 M sorbitol

0.1 M TrisHCl pH 8

5 mM EDTA pH 8

 

To make 500 mL:

31.9 g sorbitol

50 mL 1 M TrisHCl

5 mL 0.5 M EDTA

Fill up to 500 mL with deionised water

 

Lysis Buffer

0.2 M TrisHCl pH 8

0.05 M EDTA pH 8

2 M NaCl

2 % CTAB

 

To make 500 mL:

100 mL 1 M TrisHCl pH 8

50 mL 0.5 M EDTA pH 8

200 mL NaCl

10 g CTAB

Fill up to 500 mL with deionised water

 

 

Sarcosyl stock (5 %)

 

 

Fresh Working Buffer: Make up fresh working buffer (this lasts 3-4 days). Contains 0.5 % sodiumdisulfite and 4 % PVP-40 (K29-32) Sigma

 

To make 120 mL:

0.6 g sodiumdisulfite

4.8 g PVP-40

50 mL extraction buffer

50 mL lysis buffer

20 mL sarcosyl

 

To make 30 mL:

0.15 g sodiumdisulfite

1.2 g PVP-40

12.5 mL extraction buffer

12.5 mL lysis buffer

5 mL sarcosyl

 

Proteinase K (0.1 mg/mL of fresh working buffer). This is 30 uL of Qiagen proteinase K (20 mg/mL).

components.data: Autoclave mortar and pestles before use. Prepare 2 mL tubes (sterilised) and 1.5 mL tubes (sterilised).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Autoclave mortar and pestles before use. Prepare 2 mL tubes (sterilised) and 1.5 mL tubes (sterilised).

components.data: Make up chloroform:isoamyl mixture (24:1) and 77 % ethanol. Place 100 % isopropanol in the freezer. Heat fresh working buffer to 65°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Make up chloroform:isoamyl mixture (24:1) and 77 % ethanol. Place 100 % isopropanol in the freezer. Heat fresh working buffer to 65°C.

components.data: Grind 1 leaf in mortar and pestle under liquid nitrogen to fine powder. Make sure material does not thaw. Place powder in 2 mL tubes and store in the freezer (-20°C) until needed.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grind 1 leaf in mortar and pestle under liquid nitrogen to fine powder. Make sure material does not thaw. Place powder in 2 mL tubes and store in the freezer (-20°C) until needed.

components.data: Aliquot 800 uL of fresh working buffer into each tube. Swirl fresh working buffer before adding to tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aliquot 800 uL of fresh working buffer into each tube. Swirl fresh working buffer before adding to tubes.

components.data: Add 8 uL of RNase to each tube. Incubate at 37 C for 20 mins. Mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 8 uL of RNase to each tube. Incubate at 37 C for 20 mins. Mix well.

components.data: Add 60 uL of proteinase K to each tube, mix well. Incubate for 10 min at 50 C. Inactivate at 65 C in the water bath.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 60 uL of proteinase K to each tube, mix well. Incubate for 10 min at 50 C. Inactivate at 65 C in the water bath.

components.data: Incubate tubes at 65°C for 1 to 1.5 hours, invert tubes every 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate tubes at 65°C for 1 to 1.5 hours, invert tubes every 20 minutes.

components.data: Cool down tubes for at least 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cool down tubes for at least 5 minutes.

components.data: Add 800 uL of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (24:1). Invert tubes 30 times.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 800 uL of chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (24:1). Invert tubes 30 times.

components.data: Spin at 3000 x g RT for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 3000 x g RT for 20 minutes.

components.data: Transfer water phase to fresh tube, careful not to transfer the chloroform or intermediate phase. Record the volumes added to each tube and add the same amount of ice cold isopropanol. Invert tubes 10 times.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer water phase to fresh tube, careful not to transfer the chloroform or intermediate phase. Record the volumes added to each tube and add the same amount of ice cold isopropanol. Invert tubes 10 times.
Leave tubes in fridge overnight.

components.data: The following day, spin tubes at 3,000 x g for 30 minutes. A pellet should appear at the bottom of tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The following day, spin tubes at 3,000 x g for 30 minutes. A pellet should appear at the bottom of tubes.

components.data: Discard the supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol. Vortex briefly and leave for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard the supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol. Vortex briefly and leave for 20 minutes.
Spin at 14,000 x g for 20 minutes.

components.data: Discard supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol, vortex briefly and leave in fridge overnight (can leave for two nights).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol, vortex briefly and leave in fridge overnight (can leave for two nights).

components.data: The following day, spin tubes at 14,000 x g for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The following day, spin tubes at 14,000 x g for 20 minutes.

components.data: Discard supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol. Vortex briefly and leave for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard supernatant. Add 1.5 mL of 77 % ethanol. Vortex briefly and leave for 20 minutes.

components.data: Spin at 14,000 x g for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 14,000 x g for 20 minutes.

components.data: Discard supernatant. Dry pellet for 30 minutes on the bench (or until dried).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard supernatant. Dry pellet for 30 minutes on the bench (or until dried).

components.data: Re-suspend pellet in 50 µL of sterilised water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend pellet in 50 µL of sterilised water.

components.data: When pellet is completely dissolved, run 1 µL on a 0.8 % agarose gel.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When pellet is completely dissolved, run 1 µL on a 0.8 % agarose gel.

components.data: Compare the result of gel with Qubit for concentrations (ng/µL).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Compare the result of gel with Qubit for concentrations (ng/µL).

components.data: Store samples in freezer (-20°C) until putting through the zymo purification plate.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Store samples in freezer (-20°C) until putting through the zymo purification plate.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 26 of gDNA Extraction of Eucalypts pauciflora for full genome sequencing
source_data.protocol_name: gDNA Extraction of Eucalypts pauciflora for full genome sequencing
source_data.protocol_name_html: gDNA Extraction of Eucalypts pauciflora for full genome sequencing
source_data.annotation: This follows the protocol of Zymo Research Corp for Z-96 DNA Clean and Concentrator, however contains modifications.
source_data.thread_text: This follows the protocol of Zymo Research Corp for Z-96 DNA Clean and Concentrator, however contains modifications.
source_data.body: This follows the protocol of Zymo Research Corp for Z-96 DNA Clean and Concentrator, however contains modifications.

components.data: Take 25 uL of each sample and place in another labelled 1.5 mL (so that each sample is divided between two tubes). Add 125 µL of sterilised water to each tube. Mix well.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take 25 uL of each sample and place in another labelled 1.5 mL (so that each sample is divided between two tubes). Add 125 µL of sterilised water to each tube. Mix well.

components.data: Add 600 µL of the DNA binding buffer, vortex. Leave samples for 20 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 600 µL of the DNA binding buffer, vortex. Leave samples for 20 minutes.

components.data: Place zymo plate on top of waste plate. Transfer samples to wells of zymo plate. Record which well contains which sample. Balance plate with a spare plate to 0.01 g.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place zymo plate on top of waste plate. Transfer samples to wells of zymo plate. Record which well contains which sample. Balance plate with a spare plate to 0.01 g.

components.data: Spin at 3,000 x g for 5 minutes. Check that all the solution has gone through. If it has not, increase speed (3,500 to 5,000 x g) and spin again (multiple spins may be required for all the solution to go through). Once all the solution has gone through, spin again at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 3,000 x g for 5 minutes. Check that all the solution has gone through. If it has not, increase speed (3,500 to 5,000 x g) and spin again (multiple spins may be required for all the solution to go through). Once all the solution has gone through, spin again at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.

components.data: Discard waste. Place another clean waste plate below the zymo plate. Make sure filters of zymo plate do not touch the bench when changing plates. Add 200 µL of wash buffer. Balance plate with a spare plate to 0.01 g.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard waste. Place another clean waste plate below the zymo plate. Make sure filters of zymo plate do not touch the bench when changing plates. Add 200 µL of wash buffer. Balance plate with a spare plate to 0.01 g.

components.data: Spin at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.

components.data: Add 200 uL of wash buffer and spin at 3, 000 x g for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 200 uL of wash buffer and spin at 3, 000 x g for 2 minutes.

components.data: Check that all the solution has gone through. Spin (extra spin) at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check that all the solution has gone through. Spin (extra spin) at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes.

components.data: Replace waste plate with a PCR plate. Make sure filters of zymo plate do not touch the bench when transferring.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Replace waste plate with a PCR plate. Make sure filters of zymo plate do not touch the bench when transferring.

components.data: Add 20 µL of TE to each well. Allow to elute for 30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 20 µL of TE to each well. Allow to elute for 30 minutes.

components.data: Spin at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes. All liquid should have passed through the wells into the PCR plate. Liquid should be clear. This is the first elution. Remove the first PCR plate and seal and label.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 3,000 x g for 2 minutes. All liquid should have passed through the wells into the PCR plate. Liquid should be clear. This is the first elution. Remove the first PCR plate and seal and label.

components.data: Place zymo on a second PCR plate (for the second elution). Repeat steps 10 to 11, but only add 15 uL of TE to maximise concentration.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place zymo on a second PCR plate (for the second elution). Repeat steps 10 to 11, but only add 15 uL of TE to maximise concentration.

components.data: For the third elution repeat steps 10-11, but add 10 µL of TE.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: For the third elution repeat steps 10-11, but add 10 µL of TE.

components.data: Transfer samples from PCR plates into small sterilised tubes (600 µL). Mark the wells that have been used on the zymo and PCR plates and store until needed again.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer samples from PCR plates into small sterilised tubes (600 µL). Mark the wells that have been used on the zymo and PCR plates and store until needed again.

components.data: Run 1 µL of each sample on a 1 % agarose gel.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run 1 µL of each sample on a 1 % agarose gel.

components.data: Compare the result of gel with Qubit for concentrations (ng/µL).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Compare the result of gel with Qubit for concentrations (ng/µL).
Store samples in freezer (-20°C).
